thread.title: Bitter staff, small filthy rooms and no mini bar
thread.title_full: Bitter staff, small filthy rooms and no mini bar - Review of Hudson Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Eirik K
title: Bitter staff, small filthy rooms and no mini bar
text: Probably the worst hotel per dollar in upper Manhattan, small and dark rooms without any information about hotel services. Decent location and lobby, thats about it. Reconsider all other options before booking.
